text:
Henry Anthony Hood (3 October 1944 – 26 May 2019) was a Scottish football player and manager. He played as a forward.
Hood was born in Glasgow. During the 1960s and 1970s, he played for Clyde, Celtic, Motherwell
and Queen of the South in Scotland, Sunderland in England and San Antonio Thunder
in the United States. He won over ten domestic honours with Celtic. He later managed Albion Rovers and Queen of the South during the early 1980s.
Hood died on 26 May 2019, at the age of 74.
